text: Dhamake yaar saale kamse  kam yahaan toh  achhi DP lagata  :((. Great Mentor hai bhai tu or Woh football game 1 tip 1 shot yaar tu aaya nahi tha na abhi college bohot miss kia tha sabne tujhe. Koi bhi academic problem ho yaa maje marnaa ho tere sath badaa majaa aata hai. Antaragni mein tera Dance lol, Bohot jyada maje kiye hai tere room mein Mini Militia se Lekar discussions tk. Agar memoir mein  PHY101A naah hona toh yeh kabhi complete nahi hoga , TU toh janta hi hai kyu. Bas Maje krte rah or Milte rahna ;(
author: Vikram  Singh

text:
Mr. Dhaula, the silent person. 
Agar mein college photos dekhu naa toh 90% mein tu hi hai. Exams ke liye padhane se lekar exams mein pass krwane tk tu hi.  Tu or Lambo naa hote toh mera kya hota, Humesa help krne k liye ready rahne wala. Tere sath toh itni memories hai ki yeh samajh nahi aata konsi likhu pr 1 likhna toh banta hai kyu ki agar Jinda rahe or 50 saal baad reunion pr jab 1 baar fir yeh yearbook dekhe toh yaad aaye "Delhi Metro mein Goa wale kapde pehen kr kon ghumta hai (- - ) or woh topi ". Bas aese hi mast rahnaa
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Mian IITD mein milne se lekar IITK ke end tk, mera pehla college ka dost, or hamesa discussions or debate k liye ready rahne wala bandaa, woh Dance Extravanza yaad hai  tu main or patil jo upar baithe the or enjoy kiye the woh din aaj bhi yaad aata hai, Goa mein scooty chalanaa, or ghumne chalne k liye hamesa ready rahne wala, tera room agar nahi hota toh sb kahaan maje krte , Bas mian hamesa touch mein rahnaa
author: Vikram  Singh

text: Vaibhav se tension free or chill banda campus mein koi nahi mila mujhe , Ek dum chill or mast aadmi apan sabne toh Jyada time Labs mein hi maje kiye hai Exams ke alava jahaan hume kuch aata nahi tha xD.
author: Vikram  Singh
